io.micronaut.aot.core

Interface AOTSourceGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSingleClassFileGenerator, AbstractSourceGenerator, AbstractStaticServiceLoaderSourceGenerator, ApplicationContextConfigurerGenerator, ConstantPropertySourcesSourceGenerator, EnvironmentPropertiesSourceGenerator, GraalVMOptimizationFeatureSourceGenerator, JitStaticServiceLoaderSourceGenerator, KnownMissingTypesSourceGenerator, LogbackConfigurationSourceGenerator, MapPropertySourceGenerator, NativeStaticServiceLoaderSourceGenerator, PublishersSourceGenerator, SealedEnvironmentSourceGenerator, YamlPropertySourceGenerator

    public interface AOTSourceGenerator
    A source generator is the main entity of the AOT project. It is responsible for generating sources, or resources, at build time, but unlike annotation processors, source generators can use a variety of different inputs, and can even execute application code at build time to determine what optimizations to generate.
    • a static initializer, which is going to be included in the optimized entry point generated class
    • one or more source files
    • one or more resource files

      • getId

java.lang.String getId()
        A unique identifier for this source generator.
        Returns:
        the id

      • getDescription

        @NonNull
default java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getDescription()
        Returns a description for this source generator. Description is optional because some code generators are purely internal and not exposed to users.
        Returns:
        a description or an empty options

      • isEnabledOn

        @NonNull
default boolean isEnabledOn(@NonNull
                                     Runtime runtime)
        Determines if this source generator should be enabled when targetting a particular runtime.
        Parameters:
        runtime - the target runtime
        Returns:
        true if the source generator should be enabled

      • getDependencies

        @NonNull
default java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getDependencies()
        Returns the identifiers of source generators which must be executed before this generator is called.
        Returns:
        the list of ids

      • getSubGenerators

        @NonNull
default java.util.List<AOTSourceGenerator> getSubGenerators()
        Returns a list of generators which are directly managed (or instantiated_ by this source generator. Such optimizers are typically not registered as services because they make no sense in isolation. This method should be used for introspection only.
        Returns:
        the list of sub features

      • getConfigurationOptions

        @NonNull
default java.util.Set<Option> getConfigurationOptions()
        Returns the set of configuration keys which affect the configuration of this source generator.
        Returns:
        a set of configuration keys

                  SourceGenerationContext context)
        Initializes the source generator.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to be injected

      • generateStaticInit

        @NonNull
default java.util.Optional<com.squareup.javapoet.MethodSpec> generateStaticInit()
        Registers a static method which would have to be called at initialization time of the optimized entry point.
        Returns:
        a method spec, if any

      • generateSourceFiles

        @NonNull
default java.util.List<com.squareup.javapoet.JavaFile> generateSourceFiles()
        Generates source files.
        Returns:
        the list of generated source files, never null.
